attributes.action: Go 'full steam ahead' with European Union.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No more pussyfooting around!  If we are going to be part of the 'United states of Europe', let's do it properly.  No half measures Tony, let's go the whole nine metres! 

Specifically, scrap all imperial measures, join the euro, enforce regionalisation, remove all immigration control and hand over tax raising and legislative power to Brussels.

What are you waiting for Tony?  Why mess around?  FULL EU UNION NOW!!!
